name: Overkiller
description:
HTML5 is very buggy, .EXE is recommended for best experience.

The elders speak with a booming voice. "Welcome to the first ever arena battle. You get one advantage, choose wise-"
"Infinite gun barrels." You blurt out.

what is wrong with you.

Who are you, why would you ever choose such a dumb advantage? Find out in this adventure. Don't regret your choices.
